### Exercise 1: Basic dplyr 

```{r} 
filter(gapminder, country %in%  c("Australia", "Canada", "Germany")) 
```

```{r} 
gapminder %>%
filter(country %in%  c("Australia", "Canada", "Germany")) %>% 
  select(country, gdpPercap) 
```
